name: P. J. Narayanan
content: P J Narayanan. IIIT, Hyderabad. P J NarayananProfessor About Me I am a Professor at IIIT Hyderabad. I was its Director from April 2013 till August 2025. My research interests include Computer Vision, Computer Graphics, and Parallel Computing. A CV if you need one. Current Research Exploiting SfM Data from Community Collections Parallel Computing using CPU and GPU Ray Tracing on the GPU Computational Displays Publications A reasonably recent list of publications is here. See the CVIT publications page for more updated info. Link to publications: DBLP, Google Scholar, Semantic Scholar, ACM Author pages Education Ph.D. in Computer Science (1992), MS in Computer Science (1989). University of Maryland, College Park B.Tech (Honours) in Computer Science and Engineering (1984). IIT, Kharagpur Postions Held International Institute of Information Technology, Hyderabad. Director: from April 2013, Dean (Research): 2006 to 2013 Professor: from 2004, Associate Professor: from 2000 Head, Centre for Visual Information Technology: 2000 to 2013 Interactive Visual Media Group, Microsoft Research, Redmond. Visiting Scientis: May-July 2003 Centre for Artificial Intelligence & Robotics, DRDO, Bangalore. Scientist D, E and Head of Computer Vision & Virtual Reality: 1996 to 2000 Robotics Institute, Carnegie Mellon University, Pittsburgh. Research Faculty Member: 1992 to 1996 Department of Computer Science, University of Maryland. Graduate Assistant: 1986 to 1992 CMC R&D, Secunderabad, India. Associate Development Engineer: 1984 to 1986 IIIT, Hyderabad Achievements DataQuest Ranking: 2012, 2011 ACM India I have been associated with ACM India from its beginning in 2009. I am it's President from 2012 to 2014. Some of our achievements in the past few years. Modified September 01, 2013
